sentences.en: a research program
sentences.cn: 研究课程

sentences.en: I had to admire David's vow that he would leave the programme.
sentences.cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

sentences.en: It's the last but one day in the athletics programme.
sentences.cn: 那是田径比赛结束的前一天。

sentences.en: news and current affairs programmes
sentences.cn: 新闻时事节目

sentences.en: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentences.cn: 我们的整个节目都是关注心灵的，但却不是宗教性的。

sentences.en: She took part in a BBC radio phone-in programme.
sentences.cn: 她参加了英国广播公司听众来电参与节目。

sentences.en: Stanford University’s MBA program
sentences.cn: 斯坦福大学的工商管理硕士课程

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The £85m programme will involve an extensive rebranding of the airline.
sentences.cn: 这个8,500万英镑的项目将包括全面重塑该航空公司的形象。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: The programme of sell-offs has been implemented by the new chief executive.
sentences.cn: 新任总裁已经执行了抛售方案。

sentences.en: The programme was a gold mine for small production companies.
sentences.cn: 这一方案能为产量较小的公司带来滚滚财源。

sentences.en: The programme's awfulness has ensured it is talked about.
sentences.cn: 节目如此糟糕，肯定会被人议论。

sentences.en: The road safety programme is having a demonstrable effect on road users.
sentences.cn: 道路安全方案在道路使用者身上逐渐显现出明显的效果。

sentences.en: The speakers criticised his new programme for lack of definition.
sentences.cn: 几位发言者批评他的新方案不够清楚明确。

sentences.en: the US space program
sentences.cn: 美国太空计划

sentences.en: There are wide variations caused by different academic programme structures.
sentences.cn: 不同的教学项目结构造成了巨大的差异。

sentences.en: They wanted to modernise the programme, sex it up.
sentences.cn: 他们想让节目现代化，更富吸引力。

sentences.en: This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
sentences.cn: 这门学位课程经电气工程师学院鉴定完全合格。

sentences.en: What’s your favourite television programme ?
sentences.cn: 你最喜欢的电视节目是什么？

words.tran_cn: 程序员，[计][自] 程序设计员
设计，规划；编制程序，[计] 程序编制

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)按计划行事；顺应潮流

trans.tran_cn: 计划，方案，节目（单），程序，课程
trans.tran_en: a series of actions which are designed to achieve something important

trans.tran_cn: 计划，训练，为（机器或系统）设定程序
